Jersey_City.111 Murray Street:
111 Murray Street (formerly known as 101 Murray Street or 101 Tribeca) is a residential skyscraper under construction developed by Witkoff Group and Fisher Brothers in Tribeca, Manhattan, New York City.


== Overview ==
According to Winston C. Fisher, of Fisher Brothers, the building will have 156 luxury condominiums. The tower will stand 792 feet (241.4 m) to its pinnacle, and is expected to have 2,100 square feet (195 sqm) of retail space on the ground floor.
